step.message: Dad how was your armor set?

Well son, I’m sure you know how i felt. Your feeling the same way as I did. Anxious, Proud, Excited, but most of all, ready. I’ve prepared you for this, and I’m sure you can’t wait for your first few swings of that sword!
Yes dad, and I will be more excited to be swinging that sword by your side!
Sigh... I dread that day will be coming sooner rather than later. Common dad, no need to be so glum. Its a good day today. You don’t think the Empires will actually fight on our land do you. cz
Common dad, no need to be so glum. Its a good day today. You don’t think the Empires will actually fight on our land do you?
I don’t know son. but considering the lengths these empires have gone to conquer all this land so far, i wouldn’t be surprised.
I doubt it. If the day comes when we have to defend our land, we will do some with the ferocity of 1000 suns.
